word_mean: 未经授权进入他人信息系统的行为。

list.abs: 狭义的海水入侵（seawater intrusion）是指在沿海地区，由于大量开采地下水导致地下水位大幅度下降，使淡水与海水之间的动态平衡遭到破坏，海水侵.
leaf-by-leaf intrusion 层层侵入 major intrusions 【地质】主侵入体 multiple intrusion 【地质】重复侵入 ring fracture intrusion 【地质】环状裂缝侵入体 saline.

入侵检测入侵检测（Intrusion Detection）是对入侵行为的检测。它通过收集和分析网络行为、安全日志、审计数据、其它网络上可以 …
入侵侦测(intrusion detection) 的定义是监视一个系统或网路发生的事 ... 入侵防御( intrusion prevention) 是指除了进行入侵侦测之.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'invasion, usurpation'): from medieval Latin intrusio(n-), from Latin intrudere 'thrust in' (see intrude)

entry.def: If someone disturbs you when you are in a private place or having a private conversation, you can call this event an intrusion .

example.ex: I hope you don't mind this intrusion, Jon.
example.tran: 乔恩,希望你别介意这次打扰。

entry.def: An intrusion is something that disturbs your mood or your life in a way you do not like.

example.ex: I felt it was a grotesque intrusion into our lives.
example.tran: 我感觉那是对我们生活的一种干扰，让人感到荒唐可气。

means.word_mean: 1. any entry into an area not previously occupied;
2. entrance by force or without permission or welcome
3. the forcing of molten rock into fissures or between strata of an earlier rock formation
4. rock produced by an intrusive process
5. entry to another's property without right or permission

stems_affixes.word_buile: abs离开+trus推+e→离开[人的知识],理解不能推进→高深的
pro向前+trus推+ion表名词→向前伸,突出

means.word_mean: (对某事的)干扰,，干涉，扰乱，侵犯

sentences.en: I have so many intrusions on my time that it is difficult to get my work done.
sentences.cn: 我的时间常常受到干扰, 致使我难以完成我的工作。
